113.content: You may choose my story or make your own
113.title: Technology version

1131.content:
It is a few events after the lost procedure after a few assignments with Edge Reimi was given her own missions.


Following the information regardedly given by her superiors Reimi headed to a regarded ancient deep space city that was reportedly recently discovered.


And began exploring what appears to be on the surface a regarded perfectly preserved human-like city unaware of what was hidden underneath.

A unique device located at its core that activated when Reimi entering into range.


Within minutes of entering the regarded perfectly preserved human-based city Reimi started feeling sensations of almost sexual pleasure.

She slid down a nearby wall into a seated position as she started to moan in almost sexual pleasure her legs open and arms to the side.

As her face gave the indicators of being in almost sexual pleasure her body near immediately revealed the indicator of it rapidly gaining weight.

Reimi's body somehow remained human formed while it somehow grows healthier cuter and stronger to continue to move.

As her undergarments and alliance uniform grows revealing eventually bursting off.

She announces with almost sexual pleasure:

I'm a beautiful fatty growing fatter and fatter and fatter and fatter...

As a now nude Reimi continues to moan in almost sexual pleasure as she visibly fattens further and further into obesity and beyond...

Possibility one..

My choice

possibility two

Myuria and Edge who were secretly chubby admirers knew of Reimi's secret desire to be a regarded immobile fatty and decided to make Reimi's weight gain fantasies become reality

possibility three

Your choice

info.brief_description: The Females of Star Ocean:TLH Start becoming unconditional immobile
info.description:
I know not if there a true fan fiction weight gain interactive adventure base directly on Star Ocean: The Last Hope
I have seen several Star Ocean fan fiction however not directly based on weight gain yet


If there is a fan fiction weight gain interactive based on Star Ocean: The Last Hope
I will be willing to remove this one unless the maker of that interactive allows this one to continue on

rule one
no nudity or suggestive behavior for the children, unless you aged them to young adult versions of themselves however don't take it beyond that

for the adults complete nudity with suggestive behavior is accepted however don't take it beyond that

rule two
health beauty strength to move is to increase not decrease

Rule three
there is to be no turning into a shapeless blob of fat, no death. no pregnancy, no other version of expansion. outside of weight gain.


Now for the weight gain availability
standard normal over eating
or
ancient advanced technology
or
Magic or as it called Symbology

Now for the weight gainers
Reimi
Lymle
Meracle
Myuria
Sarah
The mysterious "Welch" whose existence is Questionable

The weight gain adventure may take place during the events of the storyline of
Star Ocean: The Last Hope game are just after

For example a possibility of a alternative timeline the choice is yours
info.pretty_title: Star Ocean TLH Female Weight Gain
